mapper.select: SELECT account_id, customer_id, currency, total_balance, available_balance, frozen_balance, status, opened_at FROM accounts ORDER BY opened_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO accounts(account_id, customer_id, currency, total_balance, available_balance, frozen_balance, status, opened_at) VALUES(#{accountId}, #{customerId}, #{currency}, #{totalBalance}, #{availableBalance}, #{frozenBalance}, #{status}, #{openedAt})
